description: Returns the metric policy for the specified container.

parameters.name: ContainerName
parameters.description: The name of the container that is associated with the metric policy.

nested_items.name: MetricPolicy
nested_items.description: The metric policy that is associated with the specific container.

nested_items.name: ContainerLevelMetrics
nested_items.description: A setting to enable or disable metrics at the container level.

nested_items.name: MetricPolicyRules
nested_items.description: A parameter that holds an array of rules that enable metrics at the object level. This parameter is optional, but if you choose to include it, you must also include at least one rule. By default, you can include up to five rules. You can also request a quota increase to allow up to 300 rules per policy.

nested_items.name: ObjectGroup
nested_items.description: A path or file name that defines which objects to include in the group. Wildcards (*) are acceptable.

nested_items.name: ObjectGroupName
nested_items.description: A name that allows you to refer to the object group.
